message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think it would be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to meet you halfway at $10,750. I'm willing to pay up to $10,250 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutual agreement.
